question: Kenneth has 70 square yards of melon field. There are 26 melons per square yard. Kenneth can harvest his melons every 4 months. How many melons can Kenneth harvest within a year?
answer:
Kenneth has 26*70= <<26*70=1820>>1820 melons on his field.
Kenneth can harvest his melons 12 / 4 = <<12/4=3>>3 times per year
Therefore Kenneth can harvest 1820*3 = <<1820*3=5460>>5460 melons per year.
#### 5460
